content:
Hi everyone hope you guys are fine. i have a question when i want to access the database using

 python manage.py shell

it gives error.
1.PNG
2.PNG

that no module named configparser
and when i try install it it says it already satisfied.
my server is working fine i can access my domain. there some issue with crud operation i want to check db it is doing correctly or not.
can anyone guide me how to access database in production using putty ?
Thanks in advanced.
Use ./manage.py, not python manage.py. You were launching Python 2.
Thanks for response @Anders Kaseorg it works . but same command i am running in development it works fine for python 3
In the development environment, you are in a virtual environment where python points to a local Python 3 binary before the system's Python 2 binary.
@Anders Kaseorg Thanks a ton. i appreciate it.
